title: Risk Analysis Report in R
text: R Package producing Risk Analysis Reports

title: Risk Analysis Report in R
text: package contains set functions used help produce Risk Analysis Report. functions help automate standardize report production using bookdown package. functions can grouped three broad categories. Access Data - functions used extract data USACE enterprise databases data entered maintained risk managers. Format Pages - functions used programmatically create report links headers. Produce Figures - functions used create figures needed risk reporting.

code: # Get test data db_rel_action_action <- rarr::db_rel_action_action db_rel_dec_action <- rarr::db_rel_dec_action db_rel_dec_dec<- rarr::db_rel_dec_dec db_rel_risk_action <- rarr::db_rel_risk_action db_rel_risk_dec <- rarr::db_rel_risk_dec db_rel_risk_risk <- rarr::db_rel_risk_risk  # Wrangle data rel_action_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_action_action(db_rel_action_action) rel_dec_action<-rarr::wrangle_rel_dec_action(db_rel_dec_action) rel_dec_dec <- rarr::wrangle_rel_dec_dec(db_rel_dec_dec) rel_risk_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_action(db_rel_risk_action) rel_risk_dec <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_dec(db_rel_risk_dec) rel_risk_risk <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_risk(db_rel_risk_risk) relations<-rarr::create_relations(rel_action_action, rel_dec_action,            rel_dec_dec,rel_risk_action,rel_risk_dec,rel_risk_risk)

title: Action Items — db_action
text: data frame action items following attributes: OBJECTID Geodatabase unique identifier, numeric ACTION_NO Action item number unique identifier, character ACTION Description action item, character START_DATE Start date action, POSIXct END_DATE End date action, POSIXct TECHNICAL_POC Technical POC action, character POC_REVIEW_DATE last date technical POC reviewed action                          item, POSIXct FEATURE primary project feature impacted action,                  character ACTIVE item currently active (Yes/)? character DISCIPLINE primary discipline item (domain: discipline),                     character MANAGEMENT_STATUS current management status item                            (domain: management_status, Open/Closed),                            character OWNER owner item, character ENG_LEVEL Current engagement level item (domain: Engagement,                    Level, 1-5), character LEVEL_DATE date current enegement level, POSIXct LAST_EDITED_DATE date item last eddited, POSIXct FK_TABLE_ID used

title: Risk Items — db_risk
text: data frame risk items following attributes: OBJECTID Geodatabase unique identifier, numeric RISK_NO Risk item number unique identifier, character RISKCATEGORY general category risk (domain:                       risk_category), character FEATURE primary project feature impacted action,                  character DISCIPLINE primary discipline item (domain: discipline),                     character RISK_OPPORTUNITY_EVENT risk event prompted creation                                 risk item, character CONCERNS Description risk item, character RISK_STRATEGY strategy managing risk (domain:                        risk_strategy), character COST_LIKELIHOOD Likelihood risk impacting project cost                          (domain: cost_likelihood), character COST_IMPACT Potential impact project cost (domain: cost_impact),                      character COST_RISK Level risk project cost (low, moderate, high),                    character COST_IMPACT_PER_PROJECT Range impact project cost (                                 dollars), character CONDITIONAL_FORMATTING Cost risk color coding: low = green,                                 moderate = orange, high = red, character SCHEDULE_LIKELIHOOD Likelihood risk impacting project                              schedule (domain: schedule_likelihood),                              character SCHEDULE_IMPACT Potential impact project schedule (domain:                          schedule_impact), character SCHEDULE_RISK Level risk project schedule (low, moderate,                        high), character SCHEDULE_IMPACT_PER_PROJECT Range impact project schedule                                     (months), character CONDITIONAL_FORMATTING2 Schedule risk color coding: low = green,                                  moderate = orange, high = red, character EFFICACY_IMPACT Potential impact project effectiveness (domain:                          efficacy_impact), character EFFICACY_LIKELIHOOD Likelihood risk impacting project                              effectiveness (domain: efficacy_likelihood),                              character EFFICACY_RISK Level risk project effectiveness (low, moderate,                        high), character CONDITIONAL_FORMATTING3 Efficacy risk color coding: low = green,                                  moderate = orange, high = red, character TECHNICAL_POC Technical POC action, character POC_REVIEW_DATE last date technical POC reviewed action                          item, POSIXct TIMING_OF_DELAY Timing delay relative construction (prior                          ), character START_DATE Primary start date risk item, POSIXct END_DATE Primary end date risk item, POSIXct ACTIVE item currently active (Yes/)? character TREND importance risk item decreasing, stable,                increasing, character IMPACT Brief description expected impact                 decision, character OUTCOME Brief description expected outcome                  risk item, character MANAGEMENT_STATUS current management status item                            (domain: management_status, Open/Closed),                            character OWNER name owner item, character ENG_LEVEL Current engagement level item (domain: Engagement,                    Level, 1-5), character LEVEL_DATE date current engagement level, POSIXct TAGS Keyword tags used categorize risk items, character LAST_EDITED_DATE date item last eddited, POSIXct PDT_DISC_CONC used PDT_DISC_LIKELI_IMPACT used PDT_DISC_RISK_MANAG_STRATEGY used ACTION_ITEMS used LESSONS_LEARNED used FK_TABLE_ID used

title: Network analysis — network_analysis
text: Network analysis

title: Network analysis — network_analysis
text: relate_igraph list; used network analysis items data frame; dataframe risk, action, decision items

title: Network analysis — network_analysis
text: "related blocks" data frame used create related blocks table

title: Network analysis — network_analysis
code: # Get test data db_risk <- rarr::db_risk db_action <- rarr::db_action db_decision <- rarr::db_decision  #Wrangle test data risk <- rarr::wrangle_risk(db_risk) action <- rarr::wrangle_action(db_action) decision <- rarr::wrangle_decision(db_decision)  items<-rarr::create_items(risk, action, decision)  # Get test data db_rel_action_action <- rarr::db_rel_action_action db_rel_dec_dec<- rarr::db_rel_dec_dec db_rel_dec_action<- rarr::db_rel_dec_action db_rel_risk_action <- rarr::db_rel_risk_action db_rel_risk_dec <- rarr::db_rel_risk_dec db_rel_risk_risk <- rarr::db_rel_risk_risk  # Wrangle data rel_action_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_action_action(db_rel_action_action) rel_dec_dec <- rarr::wrangle_rel_dec_dec(db_rel_dec_dec) rel_dec_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_dec_action(db_rel_dec_action) rel_risk_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_action(db_rel_risk_action) rel_risk_dec <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_dec(db_rel_risk_dec) rel_risk_risk <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_risk(db_rel_risk_risk)  relations<-rarr::create_relations(rel_action_action, rel_dec_action, rel_dec_dec, rel_risk_action,rel_risk_dec,rel_risk_risk)  relate_igraph <- igraph::graph_from_data_frame(d = relations, vertices = items, directed = FALSE)  related_blocks<-rarr::network_analysis(relate_igraph, items)

title: Create Pandoc ATX Header — pandoc_header
text: Allows programmatic creation Pandoc ATX-style header   attributes. currently supported set Pandoc header attributes   : explicit identifier, numbered-unnumbered, listed-unlisted.

title: Create Pandoc ATX Header — pandoc_header
code: pandoc_header(text, level = 1, identifier = NA, number = TRUE, list = TRUE)

title: Create Pandoc ATX Header — pandoc_header
text: text character; Text header. level integer; Level header. identifier character; Text used specifying explicit anchor link. number logical; header numbered unnumbered? Default TRUE (numbered). list logical; heading included table contents? Default TRUE (listed).

title: Create Pandoc ATX Header — pandoc_header
text: None (invisible NULL). Returns Pandoc ATX-style header using  `cat` function.

title: Create Pandoc ATX Header — pandoc_header
text: [`pandoc` extension-header_attributes](https://pandoc.org/MANUAL.html#extension-header_attributes)

text: related_blocks data frame; `related_blocks` data frame.

title: Related Blocks Table — related_blocks_table
text: kable table related block items

title: Related Blocks Table — related_blocks_table
code: # Get test data db_risk <- rarr::db_risk db_action <- rarr::db_action db_decision <- rarr::db_decision  #Wrangle test data risk <- rarr::wrangle_risk(db_risk) action <- rarr::wrangle_action(db_action) decision <- rarr::wrangle_decision(db_decision) items<-rarr::create_items(risk, action, decision)  # Get test data db_rel_action_action <- rarr::db_rel_action_action db_rel_dec_dec<- rarr::db_rel_dec_dec db_rel_dec_action<- rarr::db_rel_dec_action db_rel_risk_action <- rarr::db_rel_risk_action db_rel_risk_dec <- rarr::db_rel_risk_dec db_rel_risk_risk <- rarr::db_rel_risk_risk  # Wrangle data rel_action_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_action_action(db_rel_action_action) rel_dec_dec <- rarr::wrangle_rel_dec_dec(db_rel_dec_dec) rel_dec_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_dec_action(db_rel_dec_action) rel_risk_action <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_action(db_rel_risk_action) rel_risk_dec <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_dec(db_rel_risk_dec) rel_risk_risk <- rarr::wrangle_rel_risk_risk(db_rel_risk_risk)  relations<-rarr::create_relations(rel_action_action, rel_dec_action, rel_dec_dec, rel_risk_action,rel_risk_dec,rel_risk_risk)  relate_igraph<- igraph::graph_from_data_frame(d = relations,vertices = items, directed = FALSE)  related_blocks<-rarr::network_analysis(relate_igraph, items)  #example block_table<-rarr::related_blocks_table(related_blocks)

title: Remove Inactive Records — remove_inactive_records
text: Removes inactive records input data frame. Data frame   must contain `ACTIVE` field coded "Yes" "".

title: Remove Inactive Records — remove_inactive_records
text: df data frame; standard risk analysis data frame. active logical; Return active records? TRUE returns active records, FALSE returns inactive records. Default = TRUE.

title: Remove Inactive Records — remove_inactive_records
text: data frame inactive records removed.

title: Remove Inactive Records — remove_inactive_records
code: # Get test data db_risk <- rarr::db_risk  risk_active <- remove_inactive_records(db_risk)

title: Remove Test Records — remove_test_records
text: Removes test records input data frame.

title: Remove Test Records — remove_test_records
text: df data frame; data frame containing test records removed. id_field character; id field checked removal

title: Remove Test Records — remove_test_records
text: data frame test records removed.

title: Remove Test Records — remove_test_records
code: # Get test data db_risk <- rarr::db_risk  # remove test records risk <- remove_test_records(db_risk, "RISK_NO")

title: Risk Timeline — timeline
text: Create `timevis` timeline project risks.

title: Risk Timeline — timeline
code: timeline(risk_df, groups_df, start, end, height = NULL)

title: Risk Timeline — timeline
text: risk_df data frame; `timevis` "data" data frame. groups_df data frame; `timevis` "groups" data frame. start date, number, string can converted date; start date timeline. end date, number, string can converted date; end date timeline. height Fixed height timeline (css units).

title: Risk Timeline — timeline
text: `timevis` created timeline visualization `htmlwidgets` object.

title: Risk Timeline — timeline
code: db_risk <- rarr::db_risk  # Wrangle risk data risk <- rarr::wrangle_risk(db_risk)  #Wrangle risk time dataframe risk_time <- rarr::wrangle_risk_time(risk)  #Wrangle risk time categories risk_time_riskcategory<-rarr::wrangle_risk_time_riskcat(risk)  timeline(risk_df=risk_time, groups_df= risk_time_riskcategory, height = "700px",start = "2021-01-01", end = "2025-01-01")         +     -     {"x":{"items":[{"id":"1604","content":"CA-001","title":"All contracts are assumed to be unrestricted (full and open). title: Wrangle Action — wrangle_action
text: Wrangle input action data frame prepares use   reporting functions package.

title: Wrangle Action — wrangle_action
text: db_action data frame; standard action data frame.

title: Wrangle Action — wrangle_action
text: formatted data frame suitable use report functions.
